plot: A banker's daughter rejects a rich client who then withdraws money to cause a run on the bank.
title: An Attempt to Smash a Bank
plot_es: A banker's daughter rejects a rich client who then withdraws money to cause a run on the bank.
original_name: An Attempt to Smash a Bank
plot_en: A banker's daughter rejects a rich client who then withdraws money to cause a run on the bank.
